lessons.goal: Understand what online selling is, why people do it, and what tools are needed.

content: Online selling means pagbebenta ng produkto gamit ang internet.
Puwede kang magbenta kahit nasa bahay ka.
Karaniwang platform ang Facebook dahil madaling gamitin.
slides.tts_text: Online selling ay pagbebenta ng produkto gamit ang internet. Puwede kang magbenta kahit nasa bahay. Karaniwang platform ang Facebook dahil madaling gamitin.

content: Nakakapag-benta kahit wala pang physical store.
Mas maraming tao ang naaabot, buyers from different places.
Simple at hindi kailangan ng mahal na equipment.
slides.tts_text: Nakakapag-benta kahit wala pang physical store. Mas maraming tao ang naaabot. Simple at hindi kailangan ng mahal na equipment.

content: Handmade items tulad ng ulam, plants, o handicrafts.
Second-hand items tulad ng damit, bags, at gadgets.
Services tulad ng tutorials, repairs, o baking.
Important: Bawal ang dangerous o restricted products.
slides.tts_text: Puwede kang magbenta ng handmade items, second-hand items, o services. Bawal ang dangerous o restricted products.
Kailangan mo ng smartphone o computer, Facebook account, malinaw na photos, at stable internet connection.

content: Meet-up – magkikita para iabot ang item.
slides.tts_text: Seller ay ikaw. Buyer ay bibili. Order ay request. COD ay cash on delivery. PM o DM ay private message. Meet-up ay personal na abutan.
Step 1: Post product. Step 2: Buyer messages. Step 3: Agree on price. Step 4: Payment or meet-up. Step 5: Deliver item.

content: Huwag mag-share ng personal address publicly.
Laging sa Messenger makipag-usap sa buyers.
slides.tts_text: Huwag mag-share ng personal address. Makipag-usap sa buyers sa Messenger.

lessons.goal: Help learners prepare a trustworthy Facebook presence for selling.

content: Buyers trust sellers with clear and real profiles.
Simple updates can make your account look professional.
slides.tts_text: Buyers trust sellers with clear profiles. Simple updates make your account look professional.

content: Use a clear photo of yourself, hindi kailangan formal.
Avoid blank or random pictures — mas credible pag real.
slides.tts_text: Gumamit ng malinaw na larawan. Iwasan ang blank o random photos.

content: Add your city or barangay (pero hindi full address).
Add a short intro like 'Small Home Seller – Ready to Serve!'
slides.tts_text: Maglagay ng city o barangay. Maglagay ng short intro tulad ng Small Home Seller – Ready to Serve.

content: Check what people can see on your profile.
Hide posts that are too personal or confusing.
slides.tts_text: I-check ang public posts at itago ang masyadong personal.

content: Notifications ensure you don’t miss messages.
slides.tts_text: Buyers expect fast replies. I-on ang Messenger notifications.

slides.slide_title: Setting Profile to Public for Selling
content: Personal posts can stay Friends Only.
slides.tts_text: Puwedeng Public ang selling posts. Personal posts ay Friends Only.

content: Don’t accept friend requests from suspicious accounts.
Check the buyer's profile before meeting them.
slides.tts_text: Huwag tanggapin ang suspicious friend requests. I-check ang buyer profile bago makipag-meet.

lessons.lesson_title: How to Create a Facebook Marketplace Listing
lessons.goal: Teach learners how to post a product for sale on Marketplace and timeline.

content: Marketplace is Facebook’s built-in buying and selling area.
slides.tts_text: Marketplace ay built-in selling area ng Facebook. Madaling gamitin at libre.
I-tap ang Marketplace icon at piliin ang Create New Listing.

content: Show front, back, close-up, and size.
slides.tts_text: Gumamit ng malinaw na photos. Ipakita ang front, back, close-up, at size.

content: Description – include color, size, condition, at delivery options.
slides.tts_text: Maglagay ng malinaw na title, price, tamang category, at detalyadong description.

content: Select your barangay or general location.
Helps buyers decide if meet-up or delivery is possible.
slides.tts_text: Piliin ang barangay o general location para malaman ng buyer kung kaya ang meet-up o delivery.

content: Meet-up sa public places tulad ng barangay hall.
Delivery: Lalamove, Grab, o local riders.
slides.tts_text: Puwede mag meet-up sa public areas o gumamit ng delivery services.

content: Listing will appear on Marketplace and search results.
slides.tts_text: I-tap ang Publish para lumabas ang listing sa Marketplace.

content: Update the post if the item is SOLD.
slides.tts_text: Laging i-check ang messages at i-update kung SOLD na.

lessons.lesson_title: How to Respond to Buyers and Manage Orders
lessons.goal: Teach communication, order handling, pricing, and avoiding scams.

content: Clear at polite communication builds trust.
Maging patient—maraming buyers ang nagtatanong ng basic questions.
slides.tts_text: Clear at polite communication builds trust. Maging patient sa buyers.
Sagutin ang inquiries tulad ng price, availability, size, color, at schedule.
Gamitin ang polite phrases tulad ng Fixed price po o Pwede po last price.
I-confirm ang item, price, quantity, schedule, at payment method.

content: Label with buyer’s first name at contact number.
slides.tts_text: Linisin ang item, i-pack ng maayos, at lagyan ng buyer label.

content: For COD, meet in public places.
Never share full home address publicly.
slides.tts_text: Iwasan ang scams—huwag tanggap screenshot-only payments at mag meet-up sa public areas.

content: Message the buyer after delivery: 'Nareceive nyo po ba?'
Good buyer relationships lead to repeat customers.
slides.tts_text: Mag follow-up after delivery. Good relationships mean repeat customers.

content: Mistakes are normal — bawat post ay improvement.
slides.tts_text: Selling online takes practice. Normal ang mistakes, at bawat post ay improvement.
